    • getInstance

      public static HikingMultiDayRoute getInstance(String startLocation, String endLocation, String Time, float distance, String difficulty, String map, int Multiday)
      Method for getting the singleton instance of the Multi-day Hike route
      Parameters:
      startLocation - starting location of the hike
      endLocation - end location of the hike
      Time - time of the hike
      distance - distance of the hike
      difficulty - difficulty of the hike
      map - map of the hike
      Multiday - if the hike is multi-day of the hike
      Returns:
      returns the info of Hike Route
